comedHabitsHelp: Help us raise our J.D. Power scores by completing the tasks below.
comedTavernDanielText: WWelcome to the ComEd Watercooler, where you can chat about work or ask questions!
comedTavernChatPlaceHolder: Type a message to your coworkers!
backgroundComEd5Notes: A figure bearing the ComEd star.
comedDisplayNameDescription: This is what appears in messages you post in the ComEd Watercooler, along with what is displayed on your avatar. To change it, click the Edit button above. If instead you want to change your login name, go to Settings->Site and look in the Registration section.
comedMattBochText1: Welcome to the Pet Place! I’m Sparky, the pet master. Click a pet’s image to add it to your avatar. They’ll grow into healthy companions on your quest for improved J.D. Power Scores.
comedMattShall: Shall I bring you your steed, <%= name %>? Once you've fed a pet enough food to turn it into a mount, it will appear here. Click a mount to saddle up!
comedWelcome2Notes: How well you do on Power Up JD tasks will control how well you do in the game!
comedWelcome3Title: Help Increase ComEd’s J.D. Power scores!
comedWelcome3Notes: As you complete tasks, your avatar will collect pets and rewards and help boost ComEd’s J.D. Power Scores.
comedRewardFor: You have earned a <%= reward %> for being committed to improving your life.
comedHeadMystery201611Desc: Celebrate ComEd's initiatives just like Anne P. in this fancy hat.
comedHeadArmoireRedHaribowDesc: Amp up your everyday style in radiant red.
comedHeadArmoireMinerHelmetNotes: Shine some light and protect your head!
comedHeadSpecialFallRogueNotes: Show your ComEd Pride in this stylish red hoodie.
comedHeadSpecialFall2015MageNotes: You can turn on the magic to help customer's have a premier experience with ComEd. Show off your Customer Service Wizardry with this sorcerous hat.
comedArmorSpecialFall2015MageNotes: You can turn on the magic to help customer's have a premier experience with ComEd. Show off your Customer Service Wizardry with these sorcerous robes.
comedArmorArmoireRedPartyDressNotes: Celebrate ComEd's initiatives just like Anne P. in this fancy dress.
comedHeadSpecialNyeNotes: Happy Birthday! Wear this hat and you'll be getting sung to every 3 minutes on your special day.
bodySpecialSummer2015RogueNotes: Keep all your safety gear close with this belt.
comedArmorMystery201609Notes: Fit in with the rest of the herd in this snuggly armor!
comedShieldSpecialSummer2016HealerNotes: Let your fandom shine on May 4th for galactic battles and short green mentors with this star.
comedShieldArmoireFloralBouquetNotes: Who doesn't love a nice bouquet of flowers?
comedHeadSpecialWinter2016WarriorNotes: Entertain your co-workers in this hat, just don't sing that song!
comedArmorRogue1Notes: Dress like a ComEd lineman to learn how to work safely and efficiently.
comedHeadArmoireRedFloppyHatNotes: A simple hat, in radiant ComEd Red
comedHeadArmoireGraduateCapNotes: Congrats! Your knowledge about energy basics and management have earned you this thinking cap!
comedHeadWarrior1Notes: Work efficiently and safely in your new ComEd Hard Hat
comedHeadSpecialWinter2015HealerNotes: Enjoy some tunes at lunch, but don't forget to take them off when working with customers or machinery.
comedHeadAccessoryMystery301405Notes: Work efficiently and safely in your new ComEd Safety Goggles
comedEyewearMystery201507Notes: These sunglasses let you stay cool even when the weather is hot.
comedShieldSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Great for scaling Electricity Poles, if you're a trained ComEd Lineman of course!
comedHeadArmoireCrownOfHeartsNotes: Show you CARE about assistance programs for ComEd Customers
comedWeaponArmoireHabiticanDiplomaNotes: You know how to make a customer's day like the best of them. Prove it by hanging this diploma up on your wall!
comedHeadMystery201408Notes: You might as well be royalty in the Customer Experience game. Wear your crown with pride knowing how you've helped ComEd customers throughout the realm.
comedWeaponSpecialWinter2016HealerNotes: Celebrate another great customer service day at ComEd with some personal confetti
comedHeadSpecialSummer2016HealerNotes: Wear this special 'do on May the 4th to let your fandom shine!
comedHeadSpecialWinter2017HealerNotes: Bring out your inner peace with some flower power for your hair
comedArmorSpecialWinter2016WarriorNotes: Entertain your co-workers in this snowman suit, just don't sing that song!
comedHeadArmoireGoldenLaurelsNotes: You deserve to be celebrated for all you've done to help Power Up JD Power
comedHeadAccessoryMystery201403Notes: Experience a day in the life of a vegetation management arborist, complete with twigs in your hair.
comedShieldSpecialSpring2015WarriorNotes: A delicious meal to sustain you past two o' clock, until the donuts in the break room start calling your name...
comedWeaponArmoireWandOfHeartsNotes: Show you CARE about assistance programs for ComEd Customers with a CARE wand.
comedArmorMystery201408Notes: Solar power is critical to the Utility of the Future! Help show your support for clean energy in this high-fashion solar dress
comedEyewearMystery301405Notes: No eyewear could be fancier than a monocle - except, perhaps, for a pair of goggles.
comedHeadArmoireYellowHairbowNotes: Amp up your everyday style in sunshine yellow.
comedWeaponSpecialWinter2016WarriorNotes: Don't forget to call J.U.L.I.E. before you dig!
comedBodySpecialSummer2015MageNotes: This buckle sure is shiny, just like ComEd's reputation as a Premier Customer Experience provider.
comedBackMystery201404Notes: You've been a customer's fairy godmother and made their day AND you got a pair of wings to prove it!
comedHeadRogue1Notes: Let your fandom shine on May 4th for mind tricks and galaxy dominations with this evil mask
comedArmorArmoireMinerOverallsNotes: They may seem worn, but they are worn by ComEd employees who ensure that your power is reliable.
comedShieldSpecialSpringHealerNotes: Decompress with a few squeezes of this 'Powering Lives' Stress Ball
comedShieldArmoireMysticLampNotes: Even though ComEd's reliability is at an all time high thanks to the smart grid, keep this LED lamp handy for an energy efficient way to continue working safely in the dark in case of an outage.
comedEyewearMystery201701Notes: These sunglasses will protect your eyes from harmful rays and will look stylish no matter what!
comedBackMystery201507Notes: Ride the waves on this totally rad ComEd Red surfboard, man.
comedWeaponSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: Don't forget to pay attention to your food intake on the job! A healthy mid-day snack will keep you safe and focused
comedShieldSpecialWinter2017WarriorNotes: Show your pride with this legendary hockey puck.
comedWeaponSpecialFallMageNotes: Part of staying safe at ComEd is keeping your work area clean. Get some help with this amazing broom!
comedHeadSpecialSpring2016HealerNotes: Celebrate May 1st with the latest in floral fashion.
comedWeaponSpecialSpring2016HealerNotes: Celebrate May 1st with the latest in floral fashion.
comedArmorSpecialWinter2017WarriorNotes: Show your team spirit and strength in this ComEd-themed gear.
comedArmorSpecialFallWarriorNotes: Invent your way into the Utility of the Future in a coat built for experimenting.
comedHeadSpecialFall2015HealerNotes: Be careful crossing the road in this hat
comedHeadWarrior4Notes: You are an Energy Efficiency Ambassador! Wear this Captain's Hat with pride.
comedArmorArmoireGraduateRobeNotes: Congrats! Your knowledge about energy basics and management have earned you this robe and superstar status
comedWeaponSpecial3Notes: Marvel at the wonders of energy wherever you go!
comedShieldSpecialWinter2017HealerNotes: Remember to stay healthy and safe with a mid-afternoon meal!
comedWeaponSpecialBardInstrumentNotes: Sing the wonders of energy efficiency on your very own axe.
comedHeadMystery201608Notes: Represent ComEd's famous reliability during harsh weather with this electrified cap.
comedHeadArmoireBlueHairbowNotes: Amp up your everyday style in cool blue.
comedGenericLoginDesc: Thanks for checking in every day as we Power Up JD!
